name: RI_1_1_16_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Destruction_Event
title: RI.1.1.16.1 Evidence of Record Entry Destruction Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Destruction Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Destruction Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when Record Entry content is destroyed according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entry content is destroyed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of destroyed Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture a destruction identifier for destroyed Record Entry content (e.g., nursing home inpatient stay from 3/15/2000 thru 6/10/2000).

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user destroying Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which destroyed Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., destroy).

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is destroyed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entry content is destroyed.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#10
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for destroying Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#11
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the data, document or other identifier for destroyed Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16.1#12
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture data elements for Record Entry content de-identified.
